name: Roll O rama
description:
SUPER ADDICTIVE top noth game!
Roll o Rama is here to stay - spin the tables to get the ball where it needs to go,
make it bounce, drop, jumb and spin into places you thought was impossible and collect all stars!

Get all stars on each level in order to unlock the next one.

Dozens of high end puzzle levels and each one of them gets even harder along the way.

Do not miss this top notch brainteaser that will keep you going fo days and weeks like crazy!
